channel.title: Constant error
channel.description:
ok a lot of people get this error..i just havent found an answer (well a decent one) ok so type the ip in and i have my account password and i put the port in i then try to enter a server says error connecting and all that.
not only is it doing it for 1 server but all the servers i try to get on and i doubt 15+ servers could all be offline. all though there was 1 server i got onto which was shamon scape..but lost ip for that :(
so any help please?

item.title: Constant error
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

[quote=“Whereschris, post:5, topic:134142”]Hmm its happening on hybridscape also?? thats werid. try re downloading moparscape.[/quote] What are you saying? You can’t get to other servers? Or you can’t get to yours?!?!?
what internet you have?

[quote=“io9, post:4, topic:134142”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=185519.msg1679189#msg1679189 date=1187290756]
blblblbl
[/quote]
You Need Help With Yourself Because You Type Like This.[/quote] You Need To Stop Typing Like This, Its Very Annoying~! <== Sorry, but had to be said/. People should fix therselfs before fixing others. brrage, there’s a rule that states that you have to use right spelling… So hes right

item.description:

Try The MoparScape Server Advertisement Section You Will Find One Thats online!

not only is it doing it for 1 server but all the servers i try to get on and i doubt 15+ servers could all be offline. [u][b]all though there was 1 server i got onto which was shamon scape..but lost ip for that [/b] [/u]
